sections.heading: Repealed.Section 7-20-2 - Repealed
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1993, ch. 354, § 19A repealed 7-20-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1983, ch. 213, § 28, relating to the short title of the County Gross Receipts Tax Act, effective July 1, 1993. For provisions of former section,seethe 1992 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
